tool_description: API that suggest the book you may want to read
title: Suggest the Book

api_list.name: default
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://suggest-the-book.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "suggest-the-book.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
